name: Default Headers
short_description: This plugin adds a default set of headers to HTTP responses

documentation.description: The [DefaultHeaders](https://ktor.io/docs/default-headers.html) plugin adds the standard `Server` and `Date` headers into each response. Moreover, you can provide additional default headers and override the `Server` header.
documentation.usage:
You can install `DefaultHeaders` as follows:
```kotlin
install(DefaultHeaders)
```
To learn how to add additional headers or override the `Server` header, see [DefaultHeaders](https://ktor.io/docs/default-headers.html).
